H0.text: Shake the container vigorously is the best way for the student to learn more about the chemical properties of the substance labeled with a long chemical name.

H1.text: Smelling a very small amount of the substance is the best way for a student to learn more about the chemical properties of a bottle that is labeled with a long chemical name.

H2.text: Looking up the name in a science book is the best way for the student who finds a bottle labeled with a long chemical name to learn more about the chemical properties of that substance.

H3.text: Testing a small amount to see if it feels slippery is the best way for the student to learn more about the chemical properties of the substance labeled with a long chemical name on the bottle.
